summary: This is an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Public Corruption Unit of the SDNY, forwarding Jeffrey Epstein's motion for pretrial release and its attachments. It indicates the motion was just filed and had not yet been reviewed.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the attached bail motion. He is the accused seeking pretrial release.

events.title: Filing of Epstein's Bail Motion
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein's motion for pretrial release was filed in court.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's motion for pretrial release was filed on July 11, 2019.
The email originates from the Co-Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The sender notes they have not yet had a chance to review the motion.
